column4: with most music there are several things we want to search by - artist, title, genre, album, year etc - why cant we extend this into other filetypes and do away with folders to create a much more flexible workspace that we can organise easily to suit out needs?
because that hasn't been made yet, become a programmer and make one
trying when i have time - been playing with ruby, python, perl, c++ and scheme (in roughly that order)
